tableDescription.description: You can have 3 points worth of enhancements on your armor.

tableData.description: Inflicts STR mod amounts of damage on grapple.
tableData.name: Bladed

tableData.description: Armor is much more comfortable to sleep in.
tableData.name: Comfort

tableData.description: Does not reduce movement speed from STR requirement.
tableData.name: Light

tableData.description: Armor resizes to fit the user. Magical items automatically do this.
tableData.name: Fitting

tableData.description: Armor shines significantly, every detail pop-up. Disadvantage on stealth checks, advantage on social checks.
tableData.name: Shiny

tableData.description: Does not grant disadvantage on stealth checks.
tableData.name: Suppressed

tableData.description: Armor is unnoticable and appears simple upon short inspection.
tableData.name: Dull
